sqlMap.select: SELECT G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_SE, G.PRT_FCLTY_NM, G.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD, G.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT, G.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_AR, G.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT, G.INFO, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB, G.FCLTS_MNG_NO, I.LOC , I.STNDRD , I.INSTL_SE , I.INSTL_NO , I.FUNC , I.CTRL_MTHD , I.INSTL_STNDRD , TO_CHAR(I.INSTL_HT) INSTL_HT , I.LAMP_FMT , I.INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = I.INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD) INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM , I.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , I.PRDLST_NM , I.MODEL , I.PTLR_DTLS , TO_CHAR(I.QY) QY , I.MAKER , I.RM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F I ON G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe#

SELECT F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G, FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ
